text:
Hey guys, what's going on? So today's scene 
is absolutely hilarious, it's fantastic for

learning about American sarcasm and of course 
will help you to understand every single joke.

But before we get started I want to let you know 
you can download this free pdf power lesson,

which is going to help you to understand 
all the vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation,

cultural notes and more. And it even has a 
nifty transcription, so you can download that

by clicking up at the top or down description 
below. Now, let's jump into the lesson!

Aww yeah, so I hope you're laughing a bit 
already, but before we jump in to learn all

that vocabulary and pronunciation, I want to 
let you know that if you are new here,

every week we make fun lessons like this, so that 
you can understand your favorite TV series

without getting lost, without missing the jokes and 
without subtitles. Like Nicole, who says that thanks

to our lessons now she actually enjoys learning 
English. And you will too, all you have to do

is hit that Subscribe button and the Bell down 
below, so you don't miss any of our new lessons!

Hey guys! So I'm so excited because we have almost 
reached 3 million subscribers here on

Learn English with TV Series. And we want to celebrate 
this with you, so we are doing a special contest

right over on our Instagram channel. So, if you go 
over there and participate, 3 lucky winners are

going to get our complete package of our Fluent 
with Friends course 100% FREE. Now in this 48-week

course you will learn alongside the TV series 
Friends and you get pdf power lessons, just like

the one you've got with today lesson, but for 
the full episodes of the first two seasons.

Plus you get vocabulary, memorization software and 
access to our Fluency Circle Global Community, and

so much more. Now participating in that contest is 
super easy there's just three things you have to do.

First you have to go follow us on Instagram 
if you haven't already. Next you have to comment on

this post and answer the question, which is "What's 
something that you love or have learned thanks to

our Learn English with TV Series channel?"
And then finally you have to tag three of your friends in

that post, and if you're feeling extra creative 
you can give actually more than one answer and

increase your chances of winning, but you have to 
make sure that you tag three new friends in each

different comment. Alright, so I look forward to 
seeing you over on Instagram and best of luck!
Hey again, I just wanted to remind you

that if you are enjoying this lesson you should 
definitely take advantage and download that FREE

pdf power lesson. This will definitely help you 
to take your fluency to the next level.

You know, we actually developed these pdf power lessons with 
the help of different academic studies, which show

how powerful watching English TV series with 
subtitles can be for your English comprehension.

And we take it to the next level because we 
explain to you every piece of pronunciation that

you are likely to not comprehend, alongside with 
all of the vocabulary and also images to help you

to recall them. And as a bonus we will also give 
you access to this memorized vocabulary software,

for the entire episode so you will never forget 
the vocabulary. So download that by clicking up

here or down description below and boost your 
English fluency. Aww yeah!

All right I hope you have had a ton of fun 
today. Don't forget to download that FREE

pdf power lesson to take your learning to the
